xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 18 April 2013
xwikidoc.content: <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 02:35 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 03:24 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 07:42 <phenotips_org> has joined #ccm 07:59 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 09:24 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 11:58 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 11:58 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 12:14 <Krinye> has joined #ccm 12:33 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 12:33 <BogdanVancea> Hello everyone, any mentors around? 12:35 <sdumitriu> Hi BogdanVancea 12:35 <sdumitriu> Yes 12:37 <BogdanVancea> hello 12:37 <BogdanVancea> I have some question regarding the Solr backend for medsavant 12:38 <BogdanVancea> project* 12:40 <sdumitriu> Go ahead 12:40 <BogdanVancea> okay 12:41 <BogdanVancea> I've browsed through the source code 12:41 <BogdanVancea> for MedSavant that is 12:42 <BogdanVancea> the services I've found are all defined in the serverapi package 12:44 <BogdanVancea> the new classes should basically replace the ones present and remove all hard the hard coded parts? 12:46 <BogdanVancea> I've also noticed the project lists Maven and Git experience as nice to have skills, but the code on the svn repo is composed of several netbeans projects 12:47 <BogdanVancea> does this mean that I would need to migrate the build process to maven? 12:47 <qwebirc89327> has joined #ccm 12:50 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 12:57 <sdumitriu> BogdanVancea: Yes, the idea is to replace hard-coded queries 12:57 <sdumitriu> No, you don't need to migrate the build yourself, this is something that we're currently working on 12:59 <BogdanVancea> I see, thanks 13:02 <BogdanVancea> I've also attempted to build the MedSavant server locally 13:03 <BogdanVancea> Is there a database dump available somewhere so I can play with it a little? 13:21 <BogdanVancea> I need to go now, I'll come back later or tomorrow with some more question. Good bye! 13:25 <sdumitriu> BogdanVancea: I'll try to get one available 13:29 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 13:30 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:34 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:38 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:42 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:46 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:50 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:54 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:58 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:02 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:05 <camelia_> has joined #ccm 14:06 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:10 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:14 <p1f> has joined #ccm 14:14 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:16 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 14:19 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:19 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu, marta need some help with the build 14:19 <kushalkhandelwal> getting some errors 14:20 <sdumitriu> Hi kushalkhandelwal 14:20 <sdumitriu> Shoot 14:20 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey 14:20 <kushalkhandelwal> when I am use the command mvn install 14:20 <kushalkhandelwal> i get a build error 14:20 <kushalkhandelwal> PhenoTips - HSQLDB Database ....................... FAILURE [48.246s] 14:20 <kushalkhandelwal> [INFO] PhenoTips - War package ........................... SKIPPED 14:20 <kushalkhandelwal> [INFO] PhenoTips - Standalone Distribution ............... SKIPPED 14:21 <kushalkhandelwal> [ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-tool-packager-plugin:4.5.1:import (default) on project database-zip: Failed to import XAR dependencies: Extension [edu.toronto.cs.phenotips:phenotips-ui-1.0-SNAPSHOT] already exists in local repository -> [Help 1] 14:21 <sdumitriu> OK 14:21 <sdumitriu> mvn clean install 14:21 <sdumitriu> This deletes everything 14:22 <sdumitriu> And then builds on a clean slate 14:22 <kushalkhandelwal> ok 14:23 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:23 <kushalkhandelwal> So what was the issue ? 14:23 <kushalkhandelwal> Sorry for the frequent disconnects my college net :\ 14:24 <kushalkhandelwal> so now my build error has changed 14:24 <kushalkhandelwal> [INFO] PhenoTips - HSQLDB Database ....................... SUCCESS [43.960s] 14:24 <kushalkhandelwal> [INFO] PhenoTips - War package ........................... FAILURE [7.357s] 14:24 <kushalkhandelwal> [INFO] PhenoTips - Standalone Distribution ............... SKIPPED 14:25 <sdumitriu> The issue is that when doing mvn install a second time, you're re-adding stuff to the database 14:25 <sdumitriu> Since it doesn't start with a new, empty database 14:25 <sdumitriu> Now the database passes correctly 14:26 <sdumitriu> What's the error for the war package? 14:26 <kushalkhandelwal> Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-war-plugin:2.2:war (default-war) on project phenotips-war: Error unpacking file [/root/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-web/4.5.1/xwiki-enterprise-web-4.5.1.war]to [/home/kushal/Projects/GSOC/phenotips/distribution/war/target/war/work/org.xwiki.enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-web]: Error while expanding /root/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-web/4.5.1/xwiki-e 14:26 <kushalkhandelwal> nterprise-web-4.5.1.war: Negative seek offset -> [Help 1] 14:26 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok , so everytime i do a install i should do a clean install so that i clear my database first 14:27 <sdumitriu> For the moment yes 14:27 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:28 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok , so everytime i do a install i should do a clean install so that i clear my database first 14:28 <sdumitriu> For the moment yes 14:29 <sdumitriu> I'm guessing there was a problem downloading the enterprise war 14:29 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:29 <sdumitriu> Since it's big 14:30 <sdumitriu> Try to delete it first: 14:31 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:33 <sdumitriu> kushalkhandelwal: Did you get that? 14:36 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:36 <sdumitriu> kushalkhandelwal: Did you get that? 14:38 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes , I will do that 14:38 <kushalkhandelwal> Disconnections :\ 14:40 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:40 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok removed that 14:40 <qwebirc458457> has joined #ccm 14:40 <kushalkhandelwal> Should i do a mvn clean install again ? 14:41 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu, 14:41 <sdumitriu> You can try 14:41 <mfiume> has joined #ccm 14:41 <sdumitriu> Alternatively you should download the file separately using a client that can resume if the download is interrupted 14:42 <sdumitriu> http://nexus.cs.toronto.edu/nexus/content/groups/public/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-web/4.5.1/xwiki-enterprise-web-4.5.1.war 14:43 <sdumitriu> Check the size to make sure it's complete 14:43 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok i got the error 14:44 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:44 <sdumitriu> kushalkhandelwal: Same error? 14:44 <kushalkhandelwal> Same error 14:45 <kushalkhandelwal> But now i know the problem 14:45 <kushalkhandelwal> i tried to open the link with the browser 14:45 <kushalkhandelwal> my college proxies set a restriction on the file size 14:45 <sdumitriu> Ah 14:45 <kushalkhandelwal> so I cannot download a size greater then a particular limit 14:45 <kushalkhandelwal> i think it is 100MB 14:45 <kushalkhandelwal> Sys Admin :\ 14:48 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:49 <kushalkhandelwal> Trying to download with a data card 14:49 <kushalkhandelwal> hopefully it should work 15:01 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 15:04 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: I have downloaded the file 15:05 <sdumitriu> OK, now try mvn clean install again 15:05 <kushalkhandelwal> I should copy the file to the repository ? 15:06 <sdumitriu> Yes 15:06 <sdumitriu> In ~/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-web/4.5.1/xwiki-enterprise-web-4.5.1.war 15:32 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:32 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: I am still getting the same error 15:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-war-plugin:2.2:war (default-war) on project phenotips-war: Error unpacking file [/root/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-web/4.5.1/xwiki-enterprise-web-4.5.1.war]to [/home/kushal/Projects/GSOC/phenotips/distribution/war/target/war/work/org.xwiki.enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-web]: Error while expanding /root/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterp 15:37 <sdumitriu> Do this: 15:37 <sdumitriu> stat ~/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-web/4.5.1/xwiki-enterprise-web-4.5.1.war 15:38 <krinye> has joined #ccm 15:38 <kushalkhandelwal> File: `/home/kushal/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-web/4.5.1/xwiki-enterprise-web-4.5.1.war' Size: 171654132 Blocks: 335280 IO Block: 4096 regular file Device: 809h/2057d Inode: 1313886 Links: 1 Access: (0664/-rw-rw-r--) Uid: ( 1000/ kushal) Gid: ( 1000/ kushal) Access: 2013-04-19 00:43:36.000000000 +0530 Modify: 2013-04-19 00:32:48.000000000 +0530 Change: 2013-04-19 00:43:36.838417139 15:39 <sdumitriu> It seems to be complete 15:39 <sdumitriu> Can you pastebin the whole log? 15:40 <kushalkhandelwal> I was doing sudo mvn clean install 15:40 <kushalkhandelwal> i think some permission errors 15:40 <kushalkhandelwal> I will paste bin the entire log 15:41 <sdumitriu> No need for sudo 15:42 <kushalkhandelwal> Cloning a new copy 15:43 <kushalkhandelwal> would do a fresh start 15:49 <kushalkhandelwal> http://pastebin.com/wFh7unue 15:52 <sdumitriu> unzip -t -v ~/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-web/4.5.1/xwiki-enterprise-web-4.5.1.war 16:00 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 16:00 <kushalkhandelwal> did that 16:04 <kushalkhandelwal> No errors detected 16:04 <kushalkhandelwal> what should i do next 16:04 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: 16:05 <sdumitriu> Hm... 16:05 <sdumitriu> Did you sudo again? 16:05 <kushalkhandelwal> I did sudo 16:06 <sdumitriu> Don't do that 16:06 <kushalkhandelwal> I initially started with sudo 16:06 <kushalkhandelwal> so now when i do mvn clean install 16:06 <kushalkhandelwal> it wont be able to clean 16:06 <kushalkhandelwal> because my target was build with sudo privliges 16:06 <sdumitriu> sudo chown -R kushal . 16:06 <sdumitriu> Then mvn clean install 16:08 <kushalkhandelwal> downloading all files again 16:09 <kushalkhandelwal> so when i used sudo mvn install where were the dependencies downloaded ? 16:11 <sdumitriu> Error unpacking file [/root/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-web/4.5.1/xwiki-enterprise-web-4.5.1.war] 16:11 <sdumitriu> So in /root/.m2 16:12 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok 16:13 <sdumitriu> As a rule, you should very rarely use sudo 16:13 <sdumitriu> Don't use it unless you're asked to 16:13 <kushalkhandelwal> so if i copy the dependencies from there and change the owner it should work 16:13 <kushalkhandelwal> Yup 16:14 <kushalkhandelwal> I should not have started with the sudo 16:17 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 16:28 <sdumitriu> kushalkhandelwal: Any progress? 16:42 <vshivam> Hi Sdumitriu 16:42 <vshivam> I am interested in working for the 16:42 <vshivam> Mobile Application for chronic disease management 16:42 <vshivam> on the Android Platform 16:43 <sdumitriu> Hi vshivam 16:43 <vshivam> I think this'll be the start of the project or has any work been done 16:43 <vshivam> on the application ? 16:44 <sdumitriu> This is a new application 16:44 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: Still downloading dependencies 16:44 <vshivam> I checked out the details on the ideas page. 16:45 <vshivam> Can you tell me something more about the project ? The ideas that we are looking at 16:46 <vshivam> a few basic features that the application is expected to have 16:47 <sdumitriu> It's supposed to be something like http://www.bantapp.com/ 16:50 <vshivam> oh okay. I'll just check it out. 16:52 <vshivam> Is this app supposed to associated to some particular disease ? 16:53 <vshivam> The one that is proposed 16:53 <vshivam> like Bant App ? 16:54 <sdumitriu> Yes 16:54 <sdumitriu> You can't have something generic for more than one disease 16:55 <vshivam> yeah 16:55 <vshivam> Diabetes or something else ? 17:00 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 17:02 <vshivam> If we know the disease I'll probably have some more idea regarding the features to put in the app 17:03 <vshivam> or are we not finalised on it yet ? 17:06 <sdumitriu> It's very open ended at the moment 17:10 <vshivam> hm. 17:11 <vshivam> Is there a way I can get started on this project ? 17:11 <vshivam> I have experience working with Android Applications 17:11 <sdumitriu> You should talk with Marc 17:11 <sdumitriu> But he's off for today 17:12 <sdumitriu> What timezone are you in? 17:12 <vshivam> India 17:12 <vshivam> utc+530 17:13 <sdumitriu> OK, try tomorrow a bit earlier 17:13 <vshivam> Okay. Thanks 17:14 <sdumitriu> We're at UTC-4 17:18 <camelia_> has joined #ccm 17:18 <camelia_> Hello! I have a question, please: which package contains classes QueryManager and Query? 17:20 <sdumitriu> Hi camelia_ 17:20 <sdumitriu> Here's a trick 17:20 <sdumitriu> Go to https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/ 17:20 <sdumitriu> Press t 17:21 <sdumitriu> Which opens the file locator 17:21 <sdumitriu> Then start typing QueryManager 17:29 <sdumitriu> camelia_: Found it? 17:33 <camelia_> YES, THANK YOU. Now I continue 17:35 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 17:57 <camelia_> has joined #ccm 18:35 <camelia_> has joined #ccm 18:36 <camelia_> I tried a XWQL query provided in the documentation where doc.creationDate > '2008-01-01' 18:37 <camelia_> and I got the following error:ERROR o.h.u.JDBCExceptionReporter - incompatible data types in combination 18:37 <camelia_> and the caught exception in the component: Exception while execute query. Query statement = [ select doc.fullName from XWikiDocument as doc where doc.creationDate > '2008-01-01' ] 18:39 <camelia_> is the date in an inappropiate format? 18:39 <sdumitriu> You should pass a real date as a parameter 18:39 <sdumitriu> Not hard-coded 18:46 <sdumitriu> $xwiki.queryManager.xwql("where doc.date > :date").bindValue('date', $xwiki.jodatime.getDateTime(2013, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0).toDate()).execute() 18:46 <sdumitriu> Anyway, since that example is on xwiki.org, then it used to work at some point, I wonder when did it stop working... 19:04 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 19:20 <camelia_> ok, I managed to execute the query now . Thank You ! 19:21 <camelia_> Good evening and see You tomorrow! 20:12 <UCC> has joined #ccm 20:59 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 23:17 <kushalk124> sdumitriu, i was finally able to complete it 23:17 <kushalk124> mvn install successful 23:17 <kushalk124> :) 23:17 <sdumitriu> Great 23:17 <sdumitriu> Do you want to try to fix a small issue? 23:18 <kushalk124> It took a lot of time :P 23:18 <kushalk124> [INFO] PhenoTips - HSQLDB Database ....................... SUCCESS [15:05.569s] 23:18 <kushalk124> [INFO] PhenoTips - War package ........................... SUCCESS [2:16.028s] 23:18 <kushalk124> [INFO] PhenoTips - Standalone Distribution ............... SUCCESS [4:40.684s 23:18 <kushalk124> Yup 23:18 <kushalk124> would like to do 23:23 <kushalk124> sdumitriu, ? 23:23 <sdumitriu> https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/issues/389 23:25 <kushalk124> Just one things before I begin 23:26 <sdumitriu> Don't hesitate to ask me questions 23:26 <kushalk124> can you help me understand the file structure 23:26 <sdumitriu> OK 23:26 <sdumitriu> First, did you read http://phenotips.org/Community/SourceRepository ? 23:27 <kushalk124> Yup read that 23:28 <kushalk124> Last night I read about how maven works 23:28 <sdumitriu> K 23:28 <kushalk124> and tried some examples also 23:28 <sdumitriu> So, there are two important places with PhenoTips code 23:28 <sdumitriu> One is everything under components/ (java code) 23:29 <sdumitriu> Two is resources/ui/ (the documents in the wiki) 23:29 <sdumitriu> You shouldn't edit the XML files directly from resources/ui/src/main/resources 23:29 <sdumitriu> But edit in the wiki, then export 23:30 <sdumitriu> The major problem is that we've hidden the UI for developers, so it's a bit harder to get to the edit mode 23:30 <sdumitriu> Here's a trick: 23:30 <sdumitriu> Press Ctrl+G 23:30 <sdumitriu> Type PhenoTips.PatientSheetCode 23:31 <sdumitriu> Then press on the Edit button 23:31 <sdumitriu> (in the browser) 23:31 <sdumitriu> Did you get to the edit mode? 23:32 <kushalk124> I didnt get you ? 23:33 <kushalk124> On what page ? 23:33 <sdumitriu> On the homepage of PhenoTips 23:33 <sdumitriu> Wait 23:33 <sdumitriu> Did you start PhenoTips locally? 23:34 <sdumitriu> After you built it: 23:34 <sdumitriu> cd distribution/standalone 23:34 <sdumitriu> unzip phenotips* 23:36 <kushalk124> the file is in distribution/standalone/target 23:37 <sdumitriu> Yes 23:37 <sdumitriu> Right 23:38 <kushalk124> i than ran ./start.sh 23:38 <sdumitriu> Yep 23:38 <sdumitriu> Then open http://localhost:8080 in a browser 23:39 <kushalk124> Started that 23:40 <sdumitriu> OK, now press Ctrl+G 23:40 <sdumitriu> No 23:40 <sdumitriu> Login first 23:40 <sdumitriu> Then press Ctrl+G 23:40 <kushalk124> What is the default login ? 23:41 <sdumitriu> username: Admin 23:41 <sdumitriu> password: admin 23:42 <kushalk124> i tried that 23:42 <kushalk124> ohh 23:42 <kushalk124> i was trying username : admin 23:42 <kushalk124> Ok let me login 23:42 <kushalk124> Done 23:54 <kushalk124> sdumitriu, ? 23:55 <sdumitriu> Right 23:55 <sdumitriu> Press Ctrl+G 23:55 <sdumitriu> It should display a modal box and darken the rest of the page 23:56 <kushalk124> I am in the editing mode :) 23:56 <sdumitriu> K 23:56 <sdumitriu> Now 23:56 <sdumitriu> Try to understand the bug and reproduce it 23:56 <kushalk124> It does not support webkit browsers 23:56 <kushalk124> I added 2 entries in measurement 23:56 <sdumitriu> Yeah, they're catching Ctrl+G early 23:57 <sdumitriu> Save, edit again 23:57 <sdumitriu> Add a third measurement 23:57 <sdumitriu> See if the labels have the same font or not 23:57 <kushalk124> Ok after editing 2 entries 23:57 <kushalk124> I save it 23:57 <kushalk124> go into edit again ? 23:57 <sdumitriu> Yes
